| Pet           | Bird     |        | Goldfish  |
| Transport     |         | Boat   |          |

However, we didn't assign the pet for position 3. Since the pet owner cannot be the animation movie watcher (A) or the comedy movie watcher (B), the pet must be the dog (F). So, the final solution table is:

#############
|               |     1     |   2    |     3     |
| Movie-Genre   | Comedy   | Boat   | Superhero |
| Pet           | Bird     |        | Goldfish  |
| Transport     |         | Boat   |          |
| Pet           | Dog      |        |          |
#############
